column3: you'll be waiting a while for the food to come out so I wouldn't recommend this place who needs to be out in a jiffy or who's looking for a quick breakfast. But when you're seated and all the while you're waiting
column4: the waitress comes every now and then to apologize for the wait and that she just checked and it'll be out shortly. I don't know if she really went and checked and all but it's the thought that counts :)
